execution_plan.description: Retrieve all sold items per receipt from the items database (one row per sold item occurrence).
Get receipt-to-customer mappings for receipts referenced in step 1 (limit to receipts observed in the items table).
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step1.Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Fetch item price information for items referenced in step 1 (limit to items observed in the items table).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE id IN ($step1.Item);
